main.name: Rahul Meghani
main.description: Currently looking for the full time opportunities in the Software Engineering Industry
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rahul! I have a Master's degree in Applied Computing from the University of Windsor. I am a firm believer of the idea that learning should never stop and this ideology has kept me going till date. I'm actively looking for full-time opportunities in Software engineering roles

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours. Relevant Coursework: Object Oriented Programming, Data Structures, Operating System, Software Engineering
Relevant Coursework: Advanced Computing Concepts, Advanced Software Engineering topics, Distributed Databases

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description:
Automated & managed user account consolidation across several platforms including Github, Jenkins, bitbucket and LDAP. 
 
 Migrated & documented the on-premised database for the Onboarding project to Azure cloud using the Flyway and Azure Jumpbox, securing backup and high availability. 
 
 Part of the development of the internal KPI website: Django backend automation with REST API development (incl. documentation) enhancing the existing features.

work.title: Software Designer
work.description:
Supported projects throughout their entire software lifecycle, incl. design, development, testing, deployment and post-production achieving a higher satisfaction ratio from clients across North America. 
 
 Partnered with backend developers and created dynamic web pages using Javascript and Django framework, increasing website leads by 15%. 
 
 Built dynamic surveys for Medallia (SaaS) clients leveraging React JS, Redux and Node JS, capturing the user response in the Medallia experience cloud for business analysis. 
 
 Created Epic, Feature, Product requirements, User Story in JIRA, and managed software workflow using Scrum methodology, increasing the task success rate by 25%.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description:
Worked on multiple software projects simultaneously and participated in the whole software development process from design to implementation and delivery. 

 Created responsive, accessible, reusable and performant UIs using ReactJS, Redux & GraphQL for more than 5 different projects 

 Built web services with J2EE using Spring MVC, Spring IOC, Spring Transactions, Spring security modules and REST APIs that were used by the customer-facing applications to improve the time on page for the average user by 2 minutes. 

 Automated the manual process of document verification by the web application, making it fast and convenient using a distributed database (Cassandra) and configuring AWS load balancer, achieving a 21% improvement in performance and scalability.

projects.title: Metaverse Web3.0 chat app (React JS & Moralis)

testimonials.text: Rahul is a pleasure to work with! He takes initiative, troubleshoots with an open mind and determination, and has become a true Medallia software implementer and guru. I highly recommend Rahul to any team, with no hesitation. I canâ€™t wait to see what he does next!
